description:
v1.6.0 
Improved transitions between scenes.
Updated Help Scene.
 
With Presentation Controller (works with Microsoft PowerPoint & OpenOffice Impress, New: Adobe Reader and Promethean ActivInspire), you can control your slide show software directly from your Pre using WiFi. 

Slide Viewer functionality (XP and Vista only for now).

Touchscreen controls to advance or go back slides.
 
Full navigation: previous/next , first/last slide, and black and white screen blanking.
 
Timer on screen to help with pacing.
Thanks to feedback, updates to Presentation Controller include:
Go To Slide #
Spacebar Advance
Screen-Stay-Awake 
 
Supports all versions from Office XP to the latest, and OpenOffice Impress too.

By installing Presentation Controller on your webOS device and a free server program on your PC, you will have complete control over your presentation.

Requirements:
1. Computer must be running Windows XP, Vista, or 7
2. Server applications must be installed and running on your computer.
3. WiFi network. The webOS device & your computer must be on the same local area network.
4. PC Server works with US English keyboard shortcuts

This App uses Metrix for anonymous usage analytics / statistics.
(http://metrix.webosroundup.com/ )
versionNote:
Improved transitions between scenes.
Updated help scene with new info.
